Fee Structure

Transparent and affordable education
  1. Home
  2. Admissions
  3. Fee Structure

Academic Year 2026-27

Fee structure is subject to revision. Please contact the admission office for the latest fee details and payment options.

Tuition Fee Structure

Category Classes Admission Fee Annual Fee Monthly Fee
Pre-Primary Nursery, LKG, UKG ₹15,000 ₹45,000 ₹3,500
Primary Class I - V ₹20,000 ₹55,000 ₹4,500
Middle Class VI - VIII ₹25,000 ₹65,000 ₹5,500
Secondary Class IX - X ₹30,000 ₹75,000 ₹6,500
Senior Secondary Class XI - XII ₹35,000 ₹85,000 ₹7,500

* Admission fee is a one-time payment. Monthly tuition fee is payable by the 10th of each month.

Other Charges

Registration Fee

Non-refundable

₹1,000

Transport Fee

Per month (route-wise)

₹2,000 - ₹3,500

Uniform & Books

Varies by class

As applicable

Examination Fee

Per examination

₹500 - ₹2,000

Payment Schedule

  • Monthly fee due by 10th of each month
  • Quarterly payment option available (5% discount)
  • Annual payment option available (10% discount)
  • Late fee of ₹50/day after 10th

Payment Methods

  • Cash payment at school office
  • Cheque / Demand Draft
  • Online bank transfer (NEFT/RTGS)
  • UPI / Debit Card / Credit Card

Have Questions About Fees?

Contact our admission office for detailed fee breakup, sibling discount, and other concessions.
